data.name: TANE DLC: SNCF - AGC Languedoc
data.detailed_description:
The AGC or 'Autorails de Grande Capacité' were designed by the Canadian manufacturer Bombardier. After delivery of the first of these railcars, SNCF and the regional councils served by TER (Transport Express Régional) were highly impressed with the design and quality of these trains. They were particularly impressed with the modular interior and flexible power choices, with diesel, electric and hybrid 'bi-mode' versions available. A particularly innovative version is the bi-mode, bi-current variant, nicknamed 'BiBi', which can run from diesel power, 1500v DC overhead and 25Kv AC overhead.

The version depicted here is a hybrid Diesel + 1500v DC version, in 'Languedoc' livery and is now available to add to your Trainz collection.

data.short_description: The AGC or 'Autorails de Grande Capacité' were designed by the Canadian manufacturer Bombardier. After delivery of the first of these railcars, SNCF and the regional councils served by TER (Transport Express Régional) were highly impressed with the design and quality of these trains.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 64bit
  • Processor: Intel 'i' series/AMD K10 series introduced 2009 onwards. 2 physical cores, 2Ghz 64 bit
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GT 430 or better/ AMD ATI 5550 or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel i5 3330/AMD FX 8350 or better, Quad physical core, 64 bit, 2.3Ghz or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 660 or better/ AMD HD 6950 or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 30 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.9
  • Processor: i5 2 Ghz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Iris Pro with 1GB VRAM supporting OpenGL 3.3
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10.10
  • Processor: i5 2.3 Ghz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated Graphics card with 1 GB VRAM supporting OpenGL 3.3
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
